subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which emperor ruled Rajasthan and what was the capital during his reign?
question_hi: राजस्थान में कौन सा सरकार था और उसके समय के दौरान क्या राजधानी थी ?
explanation_en: Alauddin Khilji was the ruler of Rajasthan during his reign and Jaipur was the capital during that time.
explanation_hi: Alauddin Khilji राजदूत राजस्थान में थे और उनके समय में Jaipur की राजधानी थी।
